ai-patthana16.48:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.48:0.3_0: formed is produced by the ideas,
ai-patthana16.48:1.1_0: Not taking up a cause of misery.
ai-patthana16.48:1.1_1: Not taking up a cause of misery ... a cause of seeking.
ai-patthana16.48:1.1_2: not committed to the practice of exertion.
ai-patthana16.48:2.1_0: Not committed to the practice of exertion, not indication.
